Package controller

Class PlayerController

java.lang.Object
controller.PlayerController
public class PlayerController
extends java.lang.Object
The PlayerController class is responsible for defining the Player's functionality.

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerController

      public PlayerController​(java.awt.Point ballPoint, int width, int height, java.awt.Rectangle container)
      1. Assigns the value of ballPoint to ballPoint 2. moveAmount is set to 0 3. Create the Platform Shape with the width and height parameter 4. Sets the Min and Max Values
      Parameters:
      ballPoint - - Position of Player
      width - - Width of Player
      height - - Height of Player
      container - - The Player Container Shape

      Returns:
